text: Ixora saulierei is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Tamil Nadu in India. ==Sources== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Ixora saulierei. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. ==External links== *World Checklist of Rubiaceae saulierei Category:Flora of Tamil Nadu Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Ixora saulierei
